component.name: Framed
component.summary: Digital Picture frame for your NFTshowroom art and personal work

description.p:
Framed turns your computer into a digital picture frame capable of displaying local images as well as images purchased at https:://nftshowroom.com.
Framed is the first application to utilize the Honeycomb back-end service that synchronizes your Hive (used by nftshowroom) account locally for non web-based applications and games. For more information about HoneyComb and its planned features checkout https://peakd.com/hive-123112/@bflanagin/project-honeycomb-hive-for-local-apps-and-games
